commits.author: Simon Willnauer
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Reads stopwords from a stopword list in Snowball format. *

* The snowball format is the following: *

    *
  • Lines may contain multiple words separated by whitespace. *
  • The comment character is the vertical line (|). *
  • Lines may contain trailing comments. *
*

* * @param reader Reader containing a Snowball stopword list * @param result the {@link CharArraySet} to fill with the readers words * @param matchVersion the Lucene {@link Version} * @return A {@link CharArraySet} with the reader's words */ public static CharArraySet getSnowballWordSet(Reader reader, Version matchVersion) throws IOException { return getSnowballWordSet(reader, new CharArraySet(matchVersion, INITITAL_CAPACITY, false)); }
